title: manamE nee
sahitya:
manamE nI Ishan nAmattai vAzhttuvAi dinam vAzhttuvAi 

(manamE)



anupallavi



anavaratamum nI arupadam pADi ghanasukhamEviDa kalandu

koNDADi 

(manamE)



caraNam 1



vambu vArtaigaLE perum pAvam vAikku shEdamallAl enna lAbham

embirAn tiru mahimai pratApam eDuttu pEshuvadu sad

kAlakSEpam 

(manamE)



caraNam 2



Ekamaga uLLurugiyE pariya iru kaNNananda bhASpangaL shoriya

dEha paravasham tAyanbu viriya shirakAdigaL anjali puriya

(manamE)



caraNam 3



karumbu tinna kai kUliyum EnO karkkaNDO amudO pasum tEnO

virumbum paramAnandame adu tAnO vEdanAyakanperkkiNai sholla

nAnO 

(manamE)
